message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $16,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Bob, I understand your initial offer, but $16,000 is already a fair price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be a great deal for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I believe we could reach an agreement at this price.
